00041 #include "pizFactorOracle.h"
00042 
00043 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 
00046 #include <math.h>
00047 #include <stdlib.h>
00048 #include <time.h>

00050 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 
00053 #define PIZ_ARRAY_INIT_SIZE                 4
00054 #define PIZ_ORACLE_INIT_SIZE                32
00055 
00056 #define PIZ_DEFAULT_STRAIGHT_RATIO          0.25
00057 #define PIZ_DEFAULT_BACKWARD_THRESHOLD      2
00058 
00059 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00060 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061 
00062 PIZFactorOracle *pizFactorOracleNew (long argc, long *argv)
00063 {
00064     PIZFactorOracle *x = NULL;
00065 
00066     if (x = (PIZFactorOracle *)malloc (sizeof(PIZFactorOracle)))
00067         {
00068             if (x->nodes = (PIZFactorOracleNode *)malloc (PIZ_ORACLE_INIT_SIZE * sizeof(PIZFactorOracleNode)))
00069                 {
00070                     x->nodes[0].arcValues = pizGrowingArrayNew (PIZ_ARRAY_INIT_SIZE);
00071                     x->nodes[0].arcDestinations = pizGrowingArrayNew (PIZ_ARRAY_INIT_SIZE);
00072                     
00073                     if (x->nodes[0].arcValues && x->nodes[0].arcDestinations)
00074                         {
00075                             srand ((unsigned int)time(NULL));
00076                             
00077                             x->size                 = PIZ_ORACLE_INIT_SIZE;
00078                             x->peak                 = 1;
00079                             x->index                = 1;
00080                             x->shuttle              = 0;
00081                             x->backwardThreshold    = PIZ_DEFAULT_BACKWARD_THRESHOLD;
00082                             x->straightRatio        = PIZ_DEFAULT_STRAIGHT_RATIO;
00083                     
00084                             x->nodes[0].referTo                 = -1;
00085                             x->nodes[0].lengthRepeatedSuffix    = 0;
00086                         }
00087                     else
00088                         {
00089                             pizGrowingArrayFree (x->nodes[0].arcValues);
00090                             pizGrowingArrayFree (x->nodes[0].arcDestinations);
00091                             
00092                             x->nodes[0].arcValues       = NULL;
00093                             x->nodes[0].arcDestinations = NULL;
00094                             
00095                             free (x->nodes);
00096                             x->nodes = NULL;
00097             
00098                             free (x);
00099                             x = NULL;
00100                         }
00101                 }
00102             else
00103                 {
00104                     free (x);
00105                     x = NULL;
00106                 }
00107         }
00108         
00109     return x;
00110 }
00111 
00112 void pizFactorOracleFree (PIZFactorOracle *x)
00113 {
00114     if (x) {
00115         long i;
00116         
00117         for (i = 0; i < x->peak; i++) {
00118                 pizGrowingArrayFree (x->nodes[i].arcValues);
00119                 pizGrowingArrayFree (x->nodes[i].arcDestinations);
00120                 
00121                 x->nodes[i].arcValues       = NULL;
00122                 x->nodes[i].arcDestinations = NULL;
00123             }
00124         
00125         free (x->nodes);
00126         x->nodes = NULL;
00127         
00128         free (x);
00129     }
00130 }

00134 
00135 PIZError pizFactorOracleAdd (PIZFactorOracle *x, long argc, long *argv)
00136 {
00137     long i;
00138     long err = PIZ_GOOD;
00139     
00140     if ((argc > 0) && argv) {
00141         for (i = 0; i < argc; i++) {
00142         
00143             long p = x->index;
00144             
00145             if (p == x->size && !err) {
00146                 PIZFactorOracleNode *newFactorOracleNodes = x->nodes;
00147             
00148                 if (newFactorOracleNodes = (PIZFactorOracleNode *)realloc (x->nodes, (x->size * 2) 
00149                     * sizeof(PIZFactorOracleNode))) {
00150                     x->size *= 2;
00151                     x->nodes = newFactorOracleNodes;
00152                 } else {
00153                     err = PIZ_MEMORY;
00154                 }
00155             }
00156             
00157             if (!err) {
00158                 x->nodes[p].referTo                 = -1;
00159                 x->nodes[p].lengthRepeatedSuffix    =  0;
00160                 
00161                 if (p == x->peak) {
00162                     if (x->nodes[p].arcValues = pizGrowingArrayNew (PIZ_ARRAY_INIT_SIZE)) {
00163                         if (x->nodes[p].arcDestinations = pizGrowingArrayNew (PIZ_ARRAY_INIT_SIZE)) {
00164                             x->peak ++;
00165                         } else {
00166                             free (x->nodes[p].arcValues);
00167                             err = PIZ_MEMORY;
00168                         }
00169                     } else {
00170                         err = PIZ_MEMORY;
00171                     }
00172                 } else {
00173                     pizGrowingArrayClear (x->nodes[p].arcValues);
00174                     pizGrowingArrayClear (x->nodes[p].arcDestinations);
00175                 }
00176             }
00177                         
00178             if (!err) {   
00179                 long t, j;
00180                 long w = 0;
00181                 long repeatedSuffix = 0;
00182         
00183                 pizGrowingArrayAppend (x->nodes[(p - 1)].arcValues, argv[i]);
00184                 pizGrowingArrayAppend (x->nodes[(p - 1)].arcDestinations, p);
00185                 
00186                 t = p - 1;
00187                 j = x->nodes[(p - 1)].referTo;
00188                 
00189                 while ((j > -1) && !pizGrowingArrayContainsValue (x->nodes[j].arcValues, argv[i]))
00190                     {
00191                         if (!pizGrowingArrayAppend (x->nodes[j].arcValues, argv[i])) {
00192                             if (pizGrowingArrayAppend (x->nodes[j].arcDestinations, p)) {
00193                                 pizGrowingArrayRemoveLastValue (x->nodes[j].arcValues);
00194                                 err = PIZ_MEMORY;
00195                             }
00196                         } else {
00197                             err = PIZ_MEMORY;
00198                         }
00199                         
00200                         t = j;
00201                         j = x->nodes[j].referTo;
00202                     }
00203                 
00204                 if (j != -1) {   
00205                     long destinationIndex = pizGrowingArrayFirstIndexOfValue (x->nodes[j].arcValues, argv[i]);
00206                     w = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (x->nodes[j].arcDestinations, destinationIndex);
00207                 }
00208                     
00209                 x->nodes[p].referTo = w;
00210                 
00211                 if (w != 0) {
00212                     PIZFactorOracleNode *ptrA = x->nodes + t;
00213                     PIZFactorOracleNode *ptrB = x->nodes + (w - 1);
00214                     
00215                     if ((w - 1) == ptrA->referTo) {
00216                         repeatedSuffix = ptrA->lengthRepeatedSuffix + 1;
00217                     } else {
00218                         while (ptrB->referTo != ptrA->referTo) {
00219                             ptrB = x->nodes + ptrB->referTo;
00220                         }
00221                         
00222                         repeatedSuffix = MIN (ptrA->lengthRepeatedSuffix, ptrB->lengthRepeatedSuffix) + 1;
00223                     }
00224                 }
00225                     
00226                 x->nodes[p].lengthRepeatedSuffix = repeatedSuffix;
00227                     
00228                 x->index ++;
00229             }
00230         }
00231     } else {
00232         err = PIZ_ERROR;
00233     }
00234         
00235     return err;
00236 }
00237 
00238 void pizFactorOracleClear (PIZFactorOracle *x)
00239 {
00240     x->index    = 1;
00241     x->shuttle  = 0;
00242     
00243     x->nodes[0].referTo                 = -1;
00244     x->nodes[0].lengthRepeatedSuffix    = 0;
00245     
00246     pizGrowingArrayClear (x->nodes[0].arcValues);
00247     pizGrowingArrayClear (x->nodes[0].arcDestinations);
00248 }
00249 
00250 PIZError pizFactorOracleProceed (PIZFactorOracle *x, long argc, long *argv)
00251 {
00252     long err = PIZ_ERROR;
00253     
00254     if (((argc > 0) && argv) && (x->index > 1)) {
00255     
00256         long k = 0;
00257         err = PIZ_GOOD;
00258 
00259         while (argc) {
00260             long                t = false;
00261             double              h = rand ( ) / (RAND_MAX + 1.0);
00262             PIZFactorOracleNode *p = NULL;
00263             
00264             if (x->shuttle == (x->index - 1)) {
00265                     x->shuttle = 0;
00266                 }
00267         
00268             p = x->nodes + x->shuttle;
00269             
00270             if (h > x->straightRatio) {
00271                 if ((h > ((x->straightRatio + 1.) / 2.)) && (p->lengthRepeatedSuffix > x->backwardThreshold)) {
00272                     x->shuttle = p->referTo;
00273                     p = x->nodes + x->shuttle;
00274                 } else if (pizGrowingArrayCount (p->arcValues) > 1) {
00275                     long i = (long)((pizGrowingArrayCount (p->arcValues) - 1) * (rand ( ) / (RAND_MAX + 1.0)));
00276                     
00277                     argv[k]     = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (p->arcValues, (i + 1));
00278                     x->shuttle  = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (p->arcDestinations, (i + 1));
00279                     t = true;
00280                 }
00281             }
00282             
00283             if (!t) {
00284                     argv[k] = pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (p->arcValues, 0);
00285                     x->shuttle ++;
00286                 }
00287             
00288             argc --;
00289             k ++;
00290         }
00291     }
00292     
00293     return err;
00294 }
00295 
00296 long pizFactorOracleCount (const PIZFactorOracle *x)
00297 {
00298     return (x->index - 1);
00299 }
